video.title: House Hunters International Collection
video.synopsis: House hunters and their realtors check out a range of architectural styles and work through the quirks of buying real estate in various countries.

episodes.synopsis: Molly moves to Mendoza, Argentina, to be with her girlfriend, Nicole, but they soon realize they have different ideas about what makes the ideal home.
episodes.title: It's Raining Mendoza

episodes.synopsis: Agreeing to live on their savings, consultant Jaclyn and veterinarian Gabriel move to St. Kitts and Nevis and look for a home within their budget.
episodes.title: Loving Every Bit of St. Kitts

episodes.synopsis: When a job transfer takes them to Grenoble, France, Perry and Naichi must adjust to some surprises in their "unfurnished" living accommodations.
episodes.title: How Grenoble of You

episodes.synopsis: Opera singers Elisa and John want to upgrade from their cramped Parisian apartment, but first, they'll have to get in tune about their budget.
episodes.title: Dreams of Paris

episodes.synopsis: Sarah and Josh want to move with their nine kids to Veneto, Italy. But finding the right house for 11 people on a budget proves to be a challenge.
episodes.title: The More the Merrier

episodes.synopsis: Hired to start a winery, Jonathan and Lisa relocate to Eastbourne, England, but the cost of re-creating their Napa Valley lifestyle is sky-high.
episodes.title: Eastbourne and Downs

episodes.synopsis: Moving to China for a dream job, John and Samantha disagree on what they want in their new house: old-school tradition or something sleek and modern?
episodes.title: Shanghai Lowdown

episodes.synopsis: In famously gridlocked Jakarta, Indonesia, Muhammad and Catherine want more family time. But can they find affordable housing within an easy commute?
episodes.title: Trouble with Jakarta Traffic

episodes.synopsis: Teachers Shannon and Chris want to move to Trieste, Italy. But while Shannon focuses on spacious living arrangements, Chris frets over affordability.
episodes.title: Trieste Travel or Budget Bust

episodes.synopsis: Jonas and Tanny plan to live in Denmark, but a job takes them to Greenland instead. Can they afford anything except government-subsidized housing?
episodes.title: Detour in Life to Greenland

episodes.synopsis: Hoping to give her twins a higher quality of life, Thalia moves to Cyprus, but she quickly discovers that space on the island comes at a premium.
episodes.title: Full Court Cyprus

episodes.synopsis: Jon, a specialist in microfinancing, moves to Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia, for a new job. But what kind of living accommodations can he afford?
episodes.title: Microfinance in Mongolia

episodes.synopsis: Medal-winning ice skater Kelly Witt wants to retire to Costa Blanca, Spain, but a robust housing market could price him right out of his dream home.
episodes.title: Captivated with Costa Blanca

episodes.synopsis: Sydney and Ciaran agree to live in Northern Ireland, but they disagree on the house: She wants a fixer-upper, but he wants one that's move-in ready.
episodes.title: DIYreland

episodes.synopsis: Alicia and Marcus move to her native Easter Island to raise their child. But with real estate scarce, they'll have to clarify their priorities.
episodes.title: Easter Island, At World's Edge

episodes.synopsis: Nikolay and Vitalina finish school in America and move to Sofia, Bulgaria. But finding a home on their newlyweds' budget is no small task.
episodes.title: So Close Yet Sofia

episodes.synopsis: Humberto hopes to give his family the good life in a showy house in Rosarito, Mexico, but his wife, Rose, wants a home with substance over style.
episodes.title: A Return to Roots in Rosarito

episodes.synopsis: After years of traveling, writer Liz hopes to settle in downtown Wellington, New Zealand, but her budget forces her to reconsider her options.
episodes.title: All's Well That Ends Wellington

episodes.synopsis: Jorge and Jeannette are retiring to Mexico, but he wants a condo while she wants a spacious house so their kids can visit. Can they reach a consensus?
episodes.title: Empty Nest in Puerto Vallarta

episodes.synopsis: Deciding to settle in Hoedspruit, South Africa, newlyweds Jacquie and Johann begin a search for an affordable house near a wild game preserve.
episodes.title: Wildlife Living in Hoedspruit

episodes.synopsis: Karl and Aude want to raise their kids in the Tuscan countryside, so the hunt is on for a house that balances solitude with proximity to Karl's job.
episodes.title: Tuscany Way You Want It

episodes.synopsis: Mike takes a job in the Marshall Islands, but finding a house with the amenities of home is challenging. How many compromises will he need to make?
episodes.title: A Move to the Marshall Islands

episodes.synopsis: A job transfer to Scotland gives Gary and Donna's family a chance to enjoy city life. But Edinburgh's apartments are out of line with their budget.
episodes.title: Seeking City Life in Edinburgh

episodes.synopsis: Alex wants her family to see the world, so they move to South Africa. But can she find the right home and help her husband adjust to the change?
episodes.title: A New Life in Johannesburg

episodes.synopsis: Nanda moves to bustling Phnom Penh, Cambodia, to get in touch with her roots. But her dreams of a quiet living space run headlong into her budget.
episodes.title: From Taxis to Tuk Tuks
